summary: Innovation in products, manufacturing processes, and business models often come from the efforts of small and medium-sized manufacturers. To help them get capital, a federal loan guarantee program was authorized in 2010. The Department of Commerce’s Economic Development Administration took steps to establish the program. However, Congress rescinded funds from EDA in 2017, 2018, and 2019, and EDA applied this to a portion of the...
title: Innovative Technologies in Manufacturing: Commerce Has Stopped Efforts to Implement Loan Guarantee Program
